title.narrative: Rural Development: Inclusive Rural Economic and Climate Resilience Programme

description.narrative: The goal of the programme is to enable poor rural people to raise their incomes and strengthen their resilience. Its development objective is to increase investments in the rural economy and strengthen climate-adaptive capacity for the poorer sections of society, leveraging the experiences of past interventions and introducing innovations.

name.narrative: Rural Development: Inclusive Rural Economic and Climate Resilience Programme

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
